featureDetails.featureDescription: Now available: (1) New GuardDuty agent versions featuring security updates for Amazon EKS, Amazon EC2, and Amazon ECS Fargate; (2) Enhanced visibility into underlying runtime coverage issues. For assessing coverage across computes and troubleshooting steps, check https://docs.aws.amazon.com/guardduty/latest/ug/runtime-monitoring-assessing-coverage.html in the Amazon GuardDuty User Guide.
